channel.title: Download Excel, CSV options are disabled in Public Dashboard View
channel.description:
Hi,
After sharing the dashboard publicly, In the public dashboard, Options button - that has "Downlaod as Excel, Download as CSV " have disappeared. Why these options are disabled when one can see the data in the dashboard?
Is there any configuration setting to enable that download functionality?
please help us to resolve this.
thanks,

item.title: Download Excel, CSV options are disabled in Public Dashboard View
item.dc:creator: nanval.cx
item.description:
But in this case it show the options why? it’s beta version?

https://redash-preview.netlify.app/embed/query/152/visualization/256?api_key=n2fAkycO81m50Q8wogXE2N1QiN44fESdqXwdp9d5

it’s a example that i found it

Read full topic
item.source: Download Excel, CSV options are disabled in Public Dashboard View

item.title: Download Excel, CSV options are disabled in Public Dashboard View
item.dc:creator: k4s1m
item.description:
MohanKumar:

is it possible to have a default user logged in always

I don’t think so.

MohanKumar:

when embedded in other internal applications?

Redash says in the docs that it’s not meant for this. You can fullscreen the link but any visitor could still navigate freely through the app, run queries etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Download Excel, CSV options are disabled in Public Dashboard View

item.title: Download Excel, CSV options are disabled in Public Dashboard View
item.dc:creator: MohanKumar
item.description:
Okay, I see another way to share the dashboard is to enable ‘Full Screen’ mode and share the browser url. In this case, is it possible to have a default user logged in always so it won’t redirect for login page and user will have seamless experience when embedded in other internal applications?

Read full topic
item.source: Download Excel, CSV options are disabled in Public Dashboard View

item.title: Download Excel, CSV options are disabled in Public Dashboard View
item.dc:creator: k4s1m
item.description:
AFAIK there’s no setting to enable this. It’s just not supported.

Read full topic
item.source: Download Excel, CSV options are disabled in Public Dashboard View
